②茶树的古称。

檟字的基本解释

檟
jiǎ
见“槚”。

檟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǎ］
［《廣韻》古疋切，上馬，見。］
亦作“榎1”。“槚1”的繁体字。
(1)即楸，落叶乔木。
(2)茶的别名。
(3)用槚木荆条之类制成的刑具笞打。

檟字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檟； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页557第15
【唐韻】古雅切【集韻】【韻會】舉下切，?音賈。【說文】楸也。【左傳·哀十一年】伍員曰：樹吾墓檟。　又【左傳·襄三年】穆姜使擇美檟。【爾雅疏】引作榎。又【左傳註】引榎作檟。　又【爾雅·釋木】檟，苦荼。【註】樹小，似梔子，冬生，葉可煑作羹飮。今呼早采者爲茶，晚取者爲茗。一名荈。

檟字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
檟字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǎ］
["Guangyun" ancient 疋切, get on the horse, see you. ]
Also known as "榎1". Traditional characters for "槚1".
(1) Namely Catalpa, deciduous tree.
(2) The alias of tea.
(3) Use a torture instrument made of ashwax and the like to fight.
Cool
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　槚; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 557 15
[Tang Yun] Gu Ya cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Lift down and cut,? Yin Jia. [Said the text] Catalpa also. [Zuo Zhuan·Eleventh Year of Amour] Member Wu said: Shuwu's tomb.　[Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Three Years] Mu Jiang Zemeizhi. 【Erya Shu】Quoted as Eunuch. Also [Zuo Zhuan Note] cited Nazhao.　[Erya·Shimu] 槚, bitter tea. [Note] The tree is small, like gardenias, born in winter, and Ye Kexuan makes soup. This is tea for early pickers, and tea for late pickers. A 荈.
